title: Kohl’s Chief Executive, Michelle Gass, Will Depart to Join Levi’s
description: Ms. Gass, who will be become president at the denim maker, is expected to take over the top post at the company within 18 months.
media:credit: Maggie Shannon for The New York Times
media:description: Levi’s said Michelle Gass, who has led Kohl’s for four years, would take over as its chief executive within 18 months.
